concept.title: Control Objects' Quality
concept.shortdesc: Default quality level of the OLE objects is determined by systemvariable OLEQUALITY. To illustrate plotting effects, the quality here is divided into five grades: line quality, text quality, graphics quality, photo quality and high photo quality.

conbody.p: In which line quality is the lowest grade, plots the drawing in the shortest way and occupies the least memory. While high photo quality plots the drawing in a longer way and occupies more memory.
